actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law

official_title: To amend title 11 of the United States Code to treat Puerto Rico as a State for purposes of chapter 9 of such title relating to the adjustment of debts of municipalities.
short_title: Puerto Rico Chapter 9 Uniformity Act of 2014

summary.text: Puerto Rico Chapter 9 Uniformity Act of 2014 - Amends the fedral bankruptcy code to treat Puerto Rice as a state under chapter 9 (Adjustment of the Debts of a Municipality).

titles.title: Puerto Rico Chapter 9 Uniformity Act of 2014
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to treat Puerto Rico as a State for purposes of chapter 9 of such title relating to the adjustment of debts of municipalities.
